name: Aphotic
description:
A game made for "Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice"

You play as a submarine pilot tasked with shutting down a damaged underwater reactor. The situation is dire and even if you succeed you unlikely to survive.

Watch your subs speed and O2 levels! Hitting things will quickly drain your O2 when that runs out its game over! ( don't worry there are plenty of respawn points)

Your visibility is low, using your sonar will reveal your surroundings, but don't wait for to recharge too often or you will run out of O2!

Thank you for playing!!

CONTROLS

Mouse/Keyboard

Mouse - Menus

W - Accelerate

A/D - Turn Left / Right

Spacebar - Sonar

Controller

DPAD - Menus

DAPD/Left Stick - Turning left/right

(A) - Accelerate

(Y) - Sonar

Made By:

Aenjo (Discord) | Music & Sound Design

Song @ SongFanAccount | Programmer

Gams @ DataTAboo | Designer / Programmer / Art
